name: LEADsms
author: localtextmarketers

sections.description:
Ideal for retail, service, and health and wellness businesses, LEADsms is the website texting widget designed to help eliminate common communication barriers between your business and your website visitors.

While chatbots, contact forms, live operators, and click to call options all work to some degree, interacting with them requires a significant investment of time (and occasionally frustration) on the part of the visitor… which means only the most highly motivated of them are likely to act.

Text messaging, however, allows the visitor to interact with your business on their preferred communication channel (today, 80% of people say texting is the best way to reach them) and then move on, responding to you when it is convenient for them.

This not only keeps your potential customer engaged but also significantly increases the likelihood of converting more casual visitors into solid leads.

Messages sent from your website visitors through the LEADsms widget are not managed in WordPress, however.

Instead, they are securely routed to the CONNECTsms texting platform where you and your team / staff members can directly engage the prospect with text chat (a subscription to CONNECTsms is required to use LEADsms; learn more here).

When a growing number of consumers are expressing a preference for using text messaging for both customer service and sales inquiries, it only makes sense that your business accommodate them.

In short, LEADsms is more than just a widget; it’s a strategic investment in your business’s future. It acknowledges the evolving landscape of customer engagement, where immediacy, convenience, and personalization are not just valued, but expected.

By integrating LEADsms into your website, you’re not just offering a service; you’re inviting your customers into a conversation, one that begins on their terms and, with the right engagement, ends with their satisfaction and your growth.

Don’t just chase leads; cultivate them with LEADsms.
sections.installation: Install the LEADsms to your blog, activate it, and then enter your CONNECTsms Activation key.
sections.changelog:
1.0.20

Release Date – 13 March 2024

  • Update readme.txt

1.0.19

Release Date

  • Initial release with all features enabled
  • Add “Text Us” label on widget UI
  • Add settings to customize widget UI

short_description: LEADsms offers WordPress webmasters an easy way to support their site visitors and generate leads and new business via SMS / text message.
